scripts.build: npm run build:fg && shx cp -r packages/function_graph/dist packages/vscode_extension/libs/function_graph && npm run build:extension
scripts.build_react: npm run build:fg_react && shx rm -rf packages/vscode_extension/libs/function_graph && shx cp -r packages/function_graph_front/build packages/vscode_extension/libs/function_graph && npm run build:extension
